core:process.core:comment: Process displaying a form allowing the user to perform currency conversion

core:processNote.core:description:
Acquirer ID should be suppied, but if not, defaults to 'SMS'.
If DCC Configuration ID is supplied, the configuration is loaded to potentialy determine which kind of lookup to us. However, at the moment, it is hard-coded to use database lookup only.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Gets the DCC Rate and sets it on the CardTenderItem if successful. If not will set DCCNotOfferedReason.

core:action.core:comment: Convert the tender amount due in base currency to DCC currency. We use rounding rule up for both tender and refund to be fair and avoid awkward refund situations.
